en._description: TukTuk Tours with Sa – Kampot. Simple, affordable tours: Kayak the Green Cathedral, Hidden Waterfall, and the Kampot Grand Tour.
en.hero_title: សូមស្វាគមន៍!  Welcome to Sa's TukTuk Tours!
en.hero_lead: I’m Sa — a licensed Cambodian tour guide and lifelong Kampot local with more than 10 years of experience. I don’t just drive; I join you for the whole adventure. As we explore mangrove forests, secret waterfalls, pepper farms, salt fields, ancient caves, and more, I’ll share the history, stories, and culture behind each place in a way that’s easy to understand and fun to hear.
en.tour_green_desc: Join me for a kayaking trip through Kampot’s famous mangrove forests. I’ll explain the local fauna and flora, show you how to make lotus crowns, and more! We’ll end the day with a traditional Khmer lunch and a swim at a secluded sandy beach.
en.pick_drop: Pick up and drop off at your hotel
en.tour_waterfall_desc: Escape the city and join me on a guided jungle hike to the Viel Pouch Waterfall. Along the way, I’ll point out local plants and wildlife and share my knowledge of the forest. Cool off with a swim, enjoy fresh fruit and drinks, and experience a quiet side of Kampot many visitors miss.
en.tour_grand_desc: Limited for time? Want to make the most of it? My Grand Tour will take you to the major tourist attractions in Kampot in a single day. Sit back, relax, and see everything Kampot has to offer!
en.quote1: “Sa is the best guide in Kampot. Friendly, funny, and full of stories.” — Alice, UK
en.quote2: “The kayak route through the mangroves was stunning. We learned so much.” — Marco, IT
en.quote3: “Grand Tour was perfect for one day. Pepper farm + caves + sunset = wow.” — Linh, VN
en.faq_book_a: Use WhatsApp, Facebook, or email below. Tell me your dates and which tour you want. I’ll confirm quickly.
en.faq_bring_a: Sunblock, hat, swimwear for kayaking/waterfall, and comfortable shoes for walking. I provide water and fruit.
en.about_text: I’m not just a tuktuk driver. I am a fully certified Cambodian tour guide with over 10 years of experience. I grew up in Kampot and speak excellent English. I don’t just drop you off and wait — I join you for the whole experience, sharing the history, stories, and details behind each place in a way that is easy to understand and fun to hear. My enthusiasm, humor, and deep local knowledge make me one of the best guides in Kampot.
en.contact_note: Choose what works for you below. Replace placeholders with my real contact details before publishing.
en.alt_waterfall3: Fresh fruit break by the river
en.faq_group_a: Yes — get in touch and I’ll tailor a price for your group.

fr._title: TukTuk Tours avec Sa • Kampot, Cambodge
fr._description: Visites en tuktuk avec Sa à Kampot : kayak dans la Cathédrale Verte, cascade cachée, Grand Tour. Réservations faciles.
fr.hero_title: សូមស្វាគមន៍ ! Bienvenue à mes TukTuk Tours
fr.hero_lead: Je m’appelle Sa — guide certifié et enfant de Kampot. J’organise de petites visites conviviales vers les lieux que j’aime : kayak dans les mangroves, cascades secrètes, fermes de poivre, salines, grottes anciennes, et plus encore.
fr.tour_green_desc: Partez avec moi en kayak à travers les mangroves de Kampot. Je vous présenterai la faune et la flore locales, je vous apprendrai à faire des couronnes de lotus, etc. Nous terminerons par un déjeuner khmer traditionnel et une baignade sur une plage de sable tranquille.
fr.pick_drop: Prise en charge et retour à votre hôtel
fr.tour_waterfall_desc: Échappez à la ville et rejoignez-moi pour une randonnée guidée dans la jungle jusqu’à la cascade de Viel Pouch. En chemin, je vous montrerai les plantes et la vie sauvage locales et partagerai mes connaissances de la forêt. Baignade, fruits frais et boissons, et un côté tranquille de Kampot que beaucoup manquent.
fr.tour_grand_desc: Peu de temps ? Envie d’en voir un maximum ? Mon Grand Tour vous emmène en une seule journée vers les principaux sites de Kampot. Détendez-vous et profitez !
fr.quote1: « Sa est le meilleur guide de Kampot. Sympa, drôle et plein d’histoires. » — Alice, Royaume-Uni
fr.quote2: « La route en kayak dans les mangroves était superbe. On a beaucoup appris. » — Marco, Italie
fr.quote3: « Le Grand Tour était parfait sur une journée. Ferme de poivre + grottes + coucher de soleil = wow. » — Linh, Vietnam
fr.faq_book_a: Utilisez WhatsApp, Facebook ou e-mail ci-dessous. Indiquez vos dates et la visite souhaitée. Je confirme rapidement.
fr.faq_bring_a: Crème solaire, chapeau, maillot pour le kayak/la cascade, et chaussures confortables pour marcher. Je fournis l’eau et des fruits.
fr.about_text: Je ne suis pas seulement conducteur de tuktuk. Je suis guide cambodgien certifié avec plus de 10 ans d’expérience. J’ai grandi à Kampot et je parle très bien anglais. Je ne vous dépose pas pour attendre — je vous accompagne tout au long de l’expérience, avec des histoires et des explications claires et amusantes. Mon enthousiasme et ma connaissance locale font de moi l’un des meilleurs guides de Kampot.
fr.contact_note: Choisissez le moyen qui vous convient. Remplacez les coordonnées de démonstration par les miennes avant publication.
fr.alt_green2: Couronnes de lotus et canaux calmes
fr.alt_green3: Déjeuner sur une plage de sable tranquille
fr.alt_waterfall1: Sentier de jungle vers la cascade
fr.alt_waterfall2: Bassin de la cascade de Viel Pouch
fr.alt_waterfall3: Pause fruits frais au bord de la rivière
fr.alt_grand2: Vignes de poivre à la ferme
fr.faq_group_a: Oui — contactez-moi et je proposerai un tarif adapté à votre groupe.

nl._description: TukTuk Tours with Sa – Kampot. Simple, affordable tours: Kayak the Green Cathedral, Hidden Waterfall, and the Kampot Grand Tour.
nl.hero_title: សូមស្វាគមន៍! Welcome to Sa's TukTuk Tours!
nl.hero_lead: I’m Sa — a licensed guide and lifelong Kampot local. I run small, friendly tours to the places I love most: mangrove kayaking, secret waterfalls, pepper farms, salt fields, ancient caves, and more. If you like stories, nature, and calm views by the river, I’ve got you.
nl.tour_green_desc: Join me for a kayaking trip through Kampot’s famous mangrove forests. I’ll explain the local fauna and flora, show you how to make lotus crowns, and more! We’ll end the day with a traditional Khmer lunch and a swim at a secluded sandy beach.
nl.pick_drop: Pick up and drop off at your hotel
nl.tour_waterfall_desc: Escape the city and join me on a guided jungle hike to the Viel Pouch Waterfall. Along the way, I’ll point out local plants and wildlife and share my knowledge of the forest. Cool off with a swim, enjoy fresh fruit and drinks, and experience a quiet side of Kampot many visitors miss.
nl.tour_grand_desc: Limited for time? Want to make the most of it? My Grand Tour will take you to the major tourist attractions in Kampot in a single day. Sit back, relax, and see everything Kampot has to offer!
nl.quote1: “Sa is the best guide in Kampot. Friendly, funny, and full of stories.” — Alice, UK
nl.quote2: “The kayak route through the mangroves was stunning. We learned so much.” — Marco, IT
nl.quote3: “Grand Tour was perfect for one day. Pepper farm + caves + sunset = wow.” — Linh, VN
nl.faq_book_a: Use WhatsApp, Facebook, or email below. Tell me your dates and which tour you want. I’ll confirm quickly.
nl.faq_bring_a: Sunblock, hat, swimwear for kayaking/waterfall, and comfortable shoes for walking. I provide water and fruit.
nl.about_text: I’m not just a tuktuk driver. I am a fully certified Cambodian tour guide with over 10 years of experience. I grew up in Kampot and speak excellent English. I don’t just drop you off and wait — I join you for the whole experience, sharing the history, stories, and details behind each place in a way that is easy to understand and fun to hear. My enthusiasm, humor, and deep local knowledge make me one of the best guides in Kampot.
nl.contact_note: Choose what works for you below. Replace placeholders with my real contact details before publishing.
nl.alt_waterfall3: Fresh fruit break by the river
nl.faq_group_a: Yes — get in touch and I’ll tailor a price for your group.
